concise_definition: n. 堆, 大量; v. 堆积, 堆叠

definitions.explanation_en: A large, untidy pile of objects or material, often gathered or thrown together without order.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指大量无序堆积的物体或材料，通常是随意堆放或抛掷而成。
definitions.example_en: There was a heap of clothes on the floor after the laundry day.
definitions.example_cn: 洗衣日过后，地板上堆了一大堆衣服。

definitions.explanation_en: A large amount or quantity of something, often used informally to emphasize abundance.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指某物的大量，常用于非正式语境中强调数量之多。
definitions.example_en: She received a heap of compliments after her performance.
definitions.example_cn: 她演出后收到了一大堆赞美。

definitions.explanation_en: To put or throw things in a large, untidy pile; to accumulate or pile up.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指将物品随意堆放或抛掷成一堆；也指大量积累。
definitions.example_en: He heaped the books onto the shelf without organizing them.
definitions.example_cn: 他把书胡乱堆在书架上，没有整理。

definitions.explanation_en: To give or bestow something in large amounts, often with generosity or excess.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指慷慨或过度地给予某物。
definitions.example_en: They heaped praise on the young actor for his breakthrough role.
definitions.example_cn: 人们纷纷称赞这位年轻演员在突破性角色中的表现。

comparison.analysis: “Pile” (堆) 与 “heap” 非常接近，都指堆积物，但 “pile” 更中性，常用于描述有意识地整齐或半整齐地堆放，如“pile of papers”；而 “heap” 更强调杂乱无章、随意堆积的形态，带有更多非正式或凌乱的语义色彩。
“Stack” (整齐的堆) 强调物品被有秩序地、垂直地叠放，如书本、盘子或箱子的整齐堆叠。它隐含结构和秩序，与 “heap” 的无序性形成鲜明对比。
“Multitude” (众多) 是一个抽象名词，指大量的人或事物，通常用于正式语境，强调数量庞大而非物理形态。而 “heap” 既可以指具体的物理堆积，也可比喻性地表示大量，但更偏向具象和口语化表达。
